description.displayText: Natasja has helped as a caregiver, homework helper, and companion for my 12-year-old daughter. She is a single child, and having someone smart, empathetic, energetic, and caring in her life has made a big difference. Natasja is endlessly creative in coming up with cooking and other projects they can do together. She is also extremely organized and responsible and working with homework assignments. Natasja is an excellent communicator and keeps in good touch with me regarding important aspects and concerns regarding my child's care.
